t: Psalm 145
Praising God’s Greatness
A hymn of David.
I*pn exalt you, my God the King, and*ln bless your name forever and ever.
I*ln will bless you every day; I*ln will praise your name forever and ever.
The*pn Lord*s is great and is highly praised; his*ln greatness is unsearchable.
One*ln generation will declare your works to the next and*ln will proclaim your mighty acts.
I*ln will speak of your splendor and glorious majesty and*ln your wondrous works.
They*ln will proclaim the power of your awe-inspiring acts, and*ln I will declare your greatness.
They*ln will give a testimony of your great goodness and*ln will joyfully sing of your righteousness.
The*pn Lord*s is gracious and compassionate, slow*ln to anger and great in faithful love.
The*ln Lord*s is good to everyone; his*ln compassion rests on all he has made.
All*ln you have made will thank you, Lord;*s the*ln faithful will bless you.
They*ln will speak of the glory of your kingdom and*ln will declare your might,
informing*ln all people of your mighty acts and*ln of the glorious splendor of your kingdom.
Your*ln kingdom is an everlasting kingdom; your*ln rule is for all generations. The*ln Lord*s is faithful in all his words and*ln gracious in all his actions.
The*pn Lord*s helps all who fall; he*ln raises up all who are oppressed.

My*ln mouth will declare the Lord’s*s praise; let*ln every living thing bless*ln his holy name forever and ever.
